CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK( FirstName )||ISBLANK(LastName ),0, 10)+ IF(ISBLANK( Title ),0, 5)+ IF(ISBLANK(TEXT( Function_Group__c ) ),0, 5)+ IF(LEN(Phone) = 0, 0,10) + IF(ISBLANK( Email ),0, 10)+ IF(ISBLANK( MailingStreet & MailingCity& MailingState& MailingPostalCode ),0, 5)+ IF(ISBLANK( OtherStreet & OtherCity& OtherState& OtherPostalCode ),0, 10)+ IF(ISBLANK( MobilePhone ),0, 5)+ IF(ISBLANK( Fax ), 0, 3)+ IF(ISBLANK( text(Status__c) ),0, 3)+ IF(ISBLANK( AccountId ),0, 5)+ IF(ISBLANK( text(Privacy_Marketing_Opt_Out__c )),0, 5)+ IF(ISBLANK( text(Email_Electronic_Opt_In__c) ),0, 3)+ IF( DoNotCall ,3,0)+ IF(Do_Not_Mail__c ,3, 0)+ IF( HasOptedOutOfFax, 3,0)+ IF(ISBLANK( Birthdate ),0, 4)+ IF(ISBLANK( text(Gender__c ) ),0, 4)+ IF(ISBLANK( Hidden_Description__c ),0, 4)
CustomField.label: Data Quality Score-Individual
